title: Can you make summoner spells work like trinkets?
body:
When you reach level 9, your summoner spells become tier 2 and have a little better stats or lower cooldown. Then you can upgrade your summoner spell to tier 3 with gold, at the shop perhaps, which gives it even better stats? And maybe give it 2 tier 3 upgrades that you can choose from, each gives a new effect  to the spell.

Here are some thoughts of mine

Flash:
Tier 2: Decreases cooldown to 270 seconds from 300.
Tier 3:
1-Decreases cooldown to 240 sec.
2-Decreases cooldown to 180 seconds. Cannot be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3 seconds. (this one can help tanks engage while limiting their escape)

Ignite:
Tier 2: Cooldown decreased to 180 seconds.
Tier 3:
1-slows the target by 25%
2-Deals 1% of the target's maximum health every second.

Cleanse:
Tier 2: Decreases cooldown to 180 seconds.
Tier 3:
1- Decreases cooldown to 150 seconds.
2- Makes your champion immune to all cc for 1.5 seconds.

Barrier can give you either better shield or a % reflection to damage recieved.

Heal can either have more heal or better move speed boost.

And so on.

What do you think?

replies.body:
This is a fun idea! Summoner spells are so stale at this point :/
Maybe a lvl 3 upgrade to tp can allow you to tp on a champ directly(without giving them stasis) or barrier can share it with the next lowest champ near your champ.
I think Ignite should have its cooldown reduced (i don't know by what integer) if someone dies to it.

The last flash uboost is a nerf lol
Rip all champs without mobility

I'm saying you can choose from the 2 tier 3 spells. So you can choose from 240 seconds flash,  or a 180 seconds but can't be used in combat.

I'm just giving examples tho.

Oh i see what you mean
Yeah it will nice, summoners spells enchants
Tier 3 flash is terrible. Also, this would make 21/0/9 masteries useless compared to 21/9/0.
